Traits.Name: Skirmisher
Traits.Description: Can move diagonally and dash action is full speed.

Traits.Name: Dodge
Traits.Description: Immune to damage from successful saves, area effects, or missed attacks.

Interrupts.Name: Disappearing Act
Interrupts.Description: When bloodied for the first time in a combat, may teleport 4 as an interrupt and gain stealth.

Actions.Name: Wicked Slice
Actions.PostAttack: Increase damage to 2[D] against blind or slow characters.
Actions.Effect: Dash 1 before and after the attack.

Actions.Name: Vile
Actions.Description: A foe in range 5 must save or become slowed, and take 1 piercing damage for each space they move until the end of their next turn.

Actions.Name: Danse Macabre
Actions.Description: Target a close blast 2 area. Teleport five times. May deal [D] to an adjacent foe each time. Must choose a different foe each time unless every foe has been hit at least once.
